com.software.reuze

Class ib_a_FilterTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ib_a_Ops
      • com.software.reuze.ib_a_FilterTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    z_BufferedImageOp
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ib_FilterBlock, ib_FilterCircle, ib_FilterDiffuse, ib_FilterDisplace, ib_FilterFieldWarp, ib_FilterKaleidoscope, ib_FilterMap, ib_FilterMarble, ib_FilterOffset, ib_FilterPerspective, ib_FilterPinch, ib_FilterPolar, ib_FilterRipple, ib_FilterRotate, ib_FilterShear, ib_FilterSphere, ib_FilterSwim, ib_FilterTwirl, ib_FilterWater

    public abstract class ib_a_FilterTransform
extends ib_a_Ops
    An abstract superclass for filters which distort images in some way. The subclass only needs to override two methods to provide the mapping between source and destination pixels.
